entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
